Table of Contents

Name

intro - introduction to local NEMO tools

Description

This section describes local programs and tools. They are sometimes useful to keep within NEMO, but do not obey the NEMO user interface rules, and are often public domain programs which we use. Not all programs listed here are actually still available from within NEMO and you may have to hunt them down on internet.

History


14-nov-93    Document created - pjt
